column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Upon entering Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba you are greeted by a very kind hostess. There appears to be plenty of seating around the bar
column2: along with two sections of the dining room. Reservations can be made online or by calling. The wine list is quite extensive
column3: and has several spanish wines to choose from. All of the dishes are quite good
column4: and when ordering from the tapas section of the menu
column5: the dishes arrive quite fast. With two people plan on ordering about 4-5 plates to split. The staff was extremely nice and attentive. I will be visiting this spot again for sure.
